my self-portrai

Here i am, making another custom sight... well shi-

Requested by @typicalpilot2311 waaaaay back in march, but i just finished it due to... Lack of motivation + School stress.

Custom sight of Tomoe Koga from the anime Bunny girl senpai

This sight is kind of weird to use at high zoom vehicles, but it is bearable in my honest opinion.

#anime #sight #customsight #bunnygirlsenpai #universal

유니버셜 조준경 / Universal Sight

WT Live에 올라온 것들중에 맘에 드는게 없어서 만들어본 조준경입니다.

계속 사용하면서 개선한 조준경을 업로드할 예정입니다.

I made this because I could not find a sight I'd like on WT live.

I will be using this and will be uploading improved versions in the future.

#eighty_six #anime
English-
I saw 86 this time and I think it was a good work.it's a sight from 86.

한국어-
이번에 에이티식스를 입문했는데 좋은 작품이 였던 것 같네요. 암튼 에이티식스에 나온 조준경입니다.

in anime/인 애니에서

#jennia #italy #m11_39 #m1139 #uklb #sights #simobombe

The standard Type 018 Mark 1 sight used by the Type 18 Medium tank in the service of the AUK. The sight works for the 37mm and the 8mm machine gun.

The sight was made as a follow up to the skin made for the M11/39 , named "Meerkat"

list.description:
Capoo sight

bottom text

Hello everyone

So, I drew a sight for the AMD.35, but I'm bad at drawing
Got inspired by the recent wave of waifus on sights
Since it's a French tank, I wrote in French the distances

Voilà... I hope you like it?

#amd #amd35 #amd_35_panhard_178 #homemade #handdrawn #art (Maybe not...)
